Class RPGGrid

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
RPGGrid.grid.Grid
public class RPGGrid
extends RPGGrid.grid.BoundedGrid

A RPGGrid is a custom grid that makes it easier to find instances of ThePlayer and can better implement grids with pre defined arrays for level management.
